summary: This bill addresses the issue of "Misbehaving Content Scrapers." The text indicates a requirement to adhere to robots.txt, a rate limit applied to an IP address, and a suggestion to use the GPO.gov Bulk Data Download for bulk data acquisition. The bill appears to be focused on regulating automated data collection and providing alternative methods for data access. It does not contain any specific policy proposals other than to make sure people are following the data rules.
